channel.title: exception on q-notes
channel.description: Recent content in exception on q-notes

item.title: ex-info & ex-data
item.description: (defn div [x] (try (/ 3 x) (catch Exception e ;; ex-info return an ExceptionInfo exception with map data (throw (ex-info (.getMessage e) {:x x}))))) (try (div 0) (catch Exception e (prn (.getMessage e)) ; "Divide by zero" ;; ex-data get map data from ExceptionInfo exception (prn (ex-data e)) ; {:x 0} ))
